select a.*, (select b.name from sys_organ b where b.id = a.parent_id) parentName, (SELECT c.item_name FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.class_code='1001001' AND c.item_value=a.level_code) levelName, (SELECT c.item_name FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.class_code='1001002' AND c.item_value=a.classification_code) classificationName from sys_organ a WHERE 1=1
and (a.name like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%' or a.short_name like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%' or a.simple_spelling like '%'+#{organ.name}+'%')

select a.*, (select b.name from sys_organ b where b.id = a.parent_id) parentName, (SELECT c.item_name FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.class_code='1001001' AND c.item_value=a.level_code) levelName, (SELECT c.item_name FROM sys_dict c WHERE c.class_code='1001002' AND c.item_value=a.classification_code) classificationName from sys_organ a order by id
